channel.title: Bing Crosby on Hansen's Songbook
channel.description: Recent content in Bing Crosby on Hansen's Songbook

item.title: Winter wonderland
item.description: D Sleigh bells ring are you listening A In the lane snow is glistening A7 Em A A7 A beautiful sight we're happy tonight Bm A D Walking in a Winter Wonderland D Gone away is the blue bird A In his place is the new bird A7 Em A A7 Hes singing our song as we go along Bm A D Walking in a Winter Wonderland Chorus: F# B F# In the meadow we can build a snowman F# B F# Then pretend that he is Parson Brown A D A He'll say Are you married We'll say No man A7 E A But you can do the job when you're in town D Later on we'll conspire A As we dream by the fire A7 Em A A7 To face unafraid the plans that we made Bm A D Walking in a Winter Wonderland
